beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE TCDTGEN USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePath}TCDTGEN.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: select base.*, ref.COD_ENT REFERENCED_COD_ENT from TCDTGEN_standardized_and_validated base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO ref on (base.COD_ENT = ref.COD_ENT and base.NUM_VER_PROC=ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS)

beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_INTERNO_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_INTERNO_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: select base.*, ref.COD_CVE_RGTRO REFERENCED_COD_CVE_RGTRO from TCDTGEN_standardized_validated_and_domain_temp0 base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_INTERNO_DRO ref on (base.COD_SIGLA_IDIOMA=ref.COD_CVE_RGTRO and base.NUM_VER_PROC=ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS) where ref.COD_CATALOGO=0021

afterAll.sql: select * from errors_TCDTGEN_standardized_and_validated union all select * from errors_TCDTGEN_standardized_and_validated_and_domain0 union all select * from errors_TCDTGEN_standardized_and_validated_and_domain1
